title: "Understat Shot Map"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(ggshakeR)
library(tidyverse)
library(worldfootballR)
library(shiny)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
data <- read_csv("top5_2021_shots.csv")
```

```{r}
inputPanel(
  selectInput(inputId = "players",
              label = "Select Player:",
              choices = sort(unique(data$player)), 
              selected = "Harry Kane")
)
```


```{r}
renderPlot({
  data %>% 
    filter(player == input$players) %>% 
    ggshakeR::plot_shot()
})
```
